name: Rocket Launch
overview: Published in Digital Marketing PD #055, Digital Marketing PD #094, Stonysoft #0419, also a game in the "Cassette 50" collection. You command four squadrons of Tornadoes. Russia has mobilized its armies and started full scale arms production. The main factories are at Helsinki, Magdeburg, Belgrade and Kiev. Those sites are guarded by surface to air missile bases. It is your job to wipe out all the factories!
